NC.Q: Was the total On-Time Delivery Rate in 1995 higher or lower than in 2001?
NC.A: The total on-time delivery rate in 1995 was {higher} than in 2001.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2001, was the average total On-Time Delivery Rate higher or lower than between 1996 and 1999?
NC.A: The average total on-time delivery rate between 2000 and 2001 was {lower} than between 1996 and 1999.
